column1:
ul {
    font-family: Arial, Verdana;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    list-style: none;
    }
    ul li {
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    float: left;
    }
    li ul {
    display: none;
    }
    ul li a {
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #ffffff;
    border-top: 1px solid #ffffff;
    padding: 5px 15px 5px 15px;
    background: #2C5463;
    margin-left: 1px;
    white-space: nowrap;
    }
    ul li a:hover {
    background: #617F8A;
    }
    li:hover ul {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    }
    li:hover li {
    float: none;
    font-size: 11px;
    }
    li:hover a {
    background: #617F8A;
    }
    li:hover li a:hover {
    background: #95A9B1;
    }
